selected_articles.title: Ruto: I saved Gachagua from impeachment attempts twice
selected_articles.snippet: President William Ruto has said that he took part in saving former Deputy President Rigathi Gachagua from being impeached by Members of Parliament.

selected_articles.title: Uhuru, Ruto in fresh war of words over Mutuse
selected_articles.snippet: The war of words between President Uhuru Kenyatta and his successor William Ruto has escalated over the Mutuse land saga.

selected_articles.title: Ruto: I won't let anyone use Mutuse to spread hate
selected_articles.snippet: President William Ruto has vowed not to let anyone use the Mutuse land saga to spread hate and division in the country.
